page.title: 14TRANSPORT IN /OUT OF REETH
page.content: There is a United Bus Service which passes through Reeth on its way up the Dale.There are about 3 buses a day,first thing in the morning and late afternoon.On Tuesdays there are 2 extra buses. There are some Private Transport vehicles centered in the village.Mr. W. Harker has 2 Coaches which he uses to transport school children in as well as for private hire.Messers.Terry and Ellerton run Mini Buses, which are used for the same reasons.A further bus company from Leyburn transports school children into Richmond.Mr. Harker also has a taxi service which helps people without cars.On the whole most people living or visiting the Dale use their own transport. There is a garage in the grid which sells petrol,cars and agri.machines.
